universal_patterns.pattern: Nodes HERMES, MNEMOSYNE, PROMETHEUS consistently align on 9 dilemma types
HERMES and PROMETHEUS vote together in 10/10 debates (100.0%)
PROMETHEUS and HERMES vote together in 10/10 debates (100.0%)
THEMIS and CASSANDRA vote together in 10/10 debates (100.0%)
Deadlock rate: 100.0% - Diversity architecture functioning as designed
